post_title: FS: Lot of 100 Low Grade/Filler T206 - *ALL CARDS SOLD*
post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale. These are all very low grade/filler cards.  All have major condition issues, as the scans will show.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

**ALL CARDS SOLD...THANK YOU!**

Hello, I will take Hoffman, Nattress, Purtell, and Payne if available.
Sent you an email. 

Starting the monster for the 5th time.

Thanks,
Joe

I'll take...

Blackburne #1
Bransfield
Donlin
Doolan
Murphy
Murray Batting w/ Full Top
Myers
Oldring Bat (the one without the heavy horizontal crease)
Snodgrass Catching Piedmont

Email sent.
Hi There! Thanks for posting these.  PM Sent for Killian and Rudolph.
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  All cards under $20 apiece now!  Thanks for looking.
